professional_summary.title: Senior Automation Engineer
professional_summary.summary: Experienced automation engineer specializing in software testing, QA automation, and AI/ML applications with expertise in C++, Python, Qt, and cloud-based testing solutions. Currently pursuing MS in Computer Science with AI Track.
professional_summary.current_role: Graduate Student - MS Computer Science (AI Track)

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence Track
education.university: Binghamton University, State University of New York
education.relevant_coursework: Data Structures, Machine Learning, Data Mining, Intelligent Mobile Robotics, NLP and DB Systems

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication Engineering

work_experience.title: Senior Automation Engineer
responsibilities: Architected a custom software solution, an Android SDK with precision testing protocols, collaborating with engineers for the identification and resolution of software defects
Authored 50,000+ efficient test cases across platforms for the resolution of software defects
Collaborated with engineers to design, implement, and test software solutions, creating a well-documented automation environment to identify and resolve software defects
Led and mentored a team of 10 engineers as Android Department Head, driving project delivery with Agile methodologies
Directed the QA lifecycle and project planning as Automation Lead for Zoho Calendar, implementing technical documentation to strengthen engineering capabilities

projects.name: Test-Lab (Team Lead & Co-Developer)
projects.description: Directed project planning and development for cloud-based testing software solutions. Gained hands-on experience devising a Mobile Farm site from scratch to host devices, enabling execution of automation and manual software development testing cycles.

projects.name: Earthworm - Plant and Disease Detection System
projects.description: Developed an AI diagnostic tool using Inception V3 to detect plant pathologies from imagery. Attained 95% accuracy across 17 disease categories by training the model on datasets.

projects.name: 3D Printer & Scanner
projects.description: Engineered a custom 3D printer and scanner, a 3D solution to produce precise 3D visualization models. Secured top rank in NIT competition for innovative design.

projects.name: Obstacle Avoiding Robot
projects.description: Wrote clean, efficient C++ code for a custom algorithm enabling autonomous obstacle avoidance in an embedded system. Secured top ranking in PHYSICA'16 competition for innovative robotics design and autonomous navigation.

additional_info.why_interested: I am passionate about building robust automation solutions and AI-powered systems. With 5+ years of experience in software testing and automation engineering, combined with my current pursuit of an MS in Computer Science with AI Track, I am excited about opportunities to contribute to innovative projects.
additional_info.cover_letter_intro: I am writing to express my strong interest in the position. With 5+ years of automation engineering experience at Zoho Corporation and currently pursuing an MS in Computer Science (AI Track) at Binghamton University, I bring a unique combination of practical testing expertise and advanced AI/ML knowledge.
additional_info.additional_notes: Currently a graduate student (MS Computer Science - AI Track) at Binghamton University, expected graduation May 2027. Seeking internship, co-op, or full-time opportunities in software engineering, automation, AI/ML, or QA engineering. On F-1 visa, eligible for OPT/CPT.

questionnaire_defaults.notice_period: Student - Available after May 2027 or for internships immediately
